name: RadioPartyGroove
0:
”Alexa, open radio party groove.”
”Alexa, ask radio party groove to play the live streaming.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: radio party groove
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The skill's content is in italian.
PARTY GROOVE is a radio station entirely dedicated to HOUSE, CHILL OUT, FUNKY & RnB music.

With this Skill you can listen to the live streaming of Radio Party Groove or listen to one of the registered programs.
Say "Alexa, open Radio Party Groove" to listen to the live stream.
If you want to listen to one of the recorded shows you can say "Alexa, ask Radio Party Groove to play me a podcast".
You can ask directly for the program you want to listen to, for example "Alexa, ask Radio Party Groove to play me Clubology". You can also specify the date on which the episode you are interested in aired, for example: "Alexa, ask Radio Party Groove to play Deep Inside Chart aired on June 11" or "Alexa, ask Radio Party Groove to play Saturday's episode of Deep Inside Chart".
While listening to a podcast, you can ask to go forward or backward in playback by a number of minutes, for example "Alexa, ask Radio Party Groove to go forward 2 minutes". Saying "Alexa, ask Radio Party Groove to go live" plays the live again.

Or ask for help by saying "Alexa, ask Radio Party Groove for help".
